text: Fisher-Price is an American company. It produces toys for children. Since 1992, the company has been owned by Mattel. The company was founded in 1930. The company has produced toys including Barney & Friends related products, Dora the Explorer products and some Disney, Muppets and Sesame Street products. ==References== Category:Companies based in New York (state) Category:1930 establishments in the United States Category:Toy companies Category:Manufacturing companies of the United States
title: Fisher-Price
